languages.text: "На пылающие планеты могу смотреть бесконечно. Люблю огонь — он не приемлет полумер, не оставляет после себя грязи. Идеальный судья".
"I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."
languages.original_text: "На пылающие планеты могу смотреть бесконечно. Люблю огонь — он не приемлет полумер, не оставляет после себя грязи. Идеальный судья".

traits.locale_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."
"I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."
"I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."
"I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."
"I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

languages.text: 「バーニングワールドを永遠に見つめていられる。俺は炎を愛している。中途半端を知らず、一片の汚れも残さない。まさに完璧な裁判官だ」
languages.original_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

traits.locale_text: 「バーニングワールドを永遠に見つめていられる。俺は炎を愛している。中途半端を知らず、一片の汚れも残さない。まさに完璧な裁判官だ」

languages.text: "Ich könnte ewig auf brennende Welten starren. Ich liebe Feuer – es macht keine halbe Sachen und hinterlässt keine Schmutzflecken. Der perfekte Richter."
languages.original_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte ewig auf brennende Welten starren. Ich liebe Feuer – es macht keine halbe Sachen und hinterlässt keine Schmutzflecken. Der perfekte Richter."

languages.text: "Yanan dünyaları sonsuza dek seyredebilirim. Ateşi severim. Nihayetinde işini yarım bırakmaz, ardında zerre kir bulundurmaz. Kusursuz bir yargıçtır."
languages.original_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

traits.locale_text: "Yanan dünyaları sonsuza dek seyredebilirim. Ateşi severim, nihayetinde işini yarım bırakmaz, ardında zerre kir bulundurmaz. Kusursuz bir yargıçtır."

languages.text: «Podría pasar horas mirando mundos ardientes. Me encanta el fuego. No entiende de medias tintas y no deja ni una mota de polvo. Es el juez perfecto».
languages.original_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

traits.locale_text: «Podría pasar horas mirando mundos ardientes. Me encanta el fuego. No entiende de medias tintas y no deja ni una mota de polvo. Es el juez perfecto».

languages.text: “我可以永远凝视着熊熊燃烧的世界。我喜欢火焰，它从不妥协，从不留下任何污秽，就像完美的仲裁者一样。”
languages.original_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

traits.locale_text: “我可以永远凝视着熊熊燃烧的世界。我喜欢火焰，它从不妥协，从不留下任何污秽，就像完美的仲裁者一样。”

languages.text: « Je pourrais passer une éternité à observer des planètes brûler. J'aime le feu : il ne connaît pas la demi-mesure et ne laisse rien derrière lui. Le juge parfait. »
languages.original_text: "I could stare at burning worlds forever. I love fire — it knows no half-measures and leaves not a speck of dirt behind. The perfect judge."

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais passer une éternité à observer des planètes brûler. J'aime le feu : il ne connaît pas la demi-mesure et ne laisse rien derrière lui. Le juge parfait. »
